title: ICPSR Subject Terms
description: A controlled list of social science terms maintained by ICPSR and used to indicate topics related to the data collection.
usageNotes: This controlled vocabulary was taken from the ICPSR Subject Terms Thesaurus. Source: https://www.icpsr.umich.edu/web/ICPSR/thesaurus/10001.

label.title: ICPSR Subject Term
label.description: A human-readable form of the subject term.

code.title: ICPSR Subject Term Code
code.description: A machine-readable/-actionable form of the subject term.

uri.title: ICPSR Subject Term URI
uri.description: The URI for the subject term.
